live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31357.summary: Some customers in North Vancouver (Central Lonsdale) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31357.title: Jan 3 - North Vancouver (Central Lonsdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
